definition: the finger next to the thumb, adjust through indexation
details:
noun
- the finger next to the thumb
= synonyms: index finger, forefinger
- an alphabetical listing of names and topics along with page numbers where they are discussed
- a number or ratio (a value on a scale of measurement) derived from a series of observed facts
= synonyms: indicator
- a mathematical notation indicating the number of times a quantity is multiplied by itself
= synonyms: power
- a numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number
verb
- adjust through indexation
= example: adjust through indexation
- provide with an index
= example: provide with an index
- list in an index
